title: Tess of the D'Urbervilles
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ISBN 0140431357.Hardy tells the story of Tess Durbeyfield, a beautiful young woman living with her impoverished family in Wessex, the southwestern English county immortalized by Hardy. After the family learns of their connection to the wealthy d'Urbervilles, they send Tess to claim a portion of their fortune.
author: Thomas Hardy
